name: Victor & Spoils
tagline: MAKE IT MATTER. OR DON'T MAKE IT AT ALL.
description:
In an industry full of ad agencies that insist they're not ad agencies, we're an ad agency. We’re Victors & Spoils. We make advertising. We make ideas worth advertising. Our clients embody the underdog spirit and embrace their challenger status, just like us. It’s not easy making work that people share, love, and even hate to love, but thankfully we’ve got all the right people. Us, our clients, and our Crowd.
It’s an open, collaborative process that gets us to work that matters, and most importantly, gives the underdogs their day.
READ MORE...
